message.content:
1. A study was conducted.
2. The purpose of the study was to compare the efficacy of two drugs.
3. The drugs being compared are morphine and tramadol.
4. The drugs were applied intra-articularly.
5. The context of the drug application was postoperative pain.
6. The surgery in question was arthroscopic knee surgery.

messages.content:
Statement: The purpose of this study was to compare the efficacy of intra-articular application of morphine and tramadol on postoperative pain after arthroscopic knee surgery.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
